segments.text: Good afternoon , ladies . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we have two adjoining double rooms , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you made a reservation , ladies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One moment , please . I have to check if there are rooms available . I'm sorry , ladies . We have only two double rooms available but they are on different floors . Would you mind that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We prefer on the same floor because we will probably chat late at night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then may I suggest a family suite ? We have just had a cancellation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a big room with a king-size double bed and two single beds . We could also add rollaways .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great ! How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two thousand hongkong dollars per night plus ten percent service charge and five percent government government tax .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But ladies , the room is not yet ready . There will be a delay of about half an hour . Perhaps you could fill in the registration form first , and then rest in our lobby for a while . We will let you know when the room is ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ladies , hotel policy requires one night's room charge as deposit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do , madam . Thank you , madam . Here's our welcome brochure with all the information of our facilities . My name is Johnny . If you need any help at all , do let me know . I'm at your service .
segments.speaker: S1
